long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the NO extension you are in the driver seat of the browsing experience. 
NO more distractions from undesired websites, triggered by automatic behaviour. 

How does it work?
Start by clicking on the extension icon in the toolbar, then by using the "Add" button, you can add the current website to the blacklist of undesired websites.
Once a website is on the list, it cannot be accessed anymore. When users accidentally trigger one of these websites, the NO extension helps their mental digital wellbeing by closing the tab immediately. To remove a website from the list, just click the red "X" button next to it, to remove it.

The extension does not track users and doesn't not sell your data to foreign governments.
